definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need

sentences.english: The low-frequency silencing effects of the box were confirmed by using actu…
sentences.chinese: 通过实际应用证实了消声箱的低频消声效果。

sentences.english: The low-frequency silencing effects of the box were confirmed by using actu…
sentences.chinese: 通过实际应用证实了消声箱的低频消声效果。

sentences.english: The new and trial-manufactured silencer excelled the silencer of original machine on each item of performances.
sentences.chinese: 新试制的消声器各项性能均优于原机消声器。

sentences.english: The new and trial-manufactured silencer excelled the silencer of original machine on each item of performances.
sentences.chinese: 新试制的消声器各项性能均优于原机消声器。

sentences.english: I put the silencer on my gun and Jeff did the same.
sentences.chinese: 我在枪上装上消声器，杰夫也把消音器安好。

sentences.english: I had a new muffler put on the Cadillac.
sentences.chinese: 我还在卡迪拉克车上装了一个新的消声器。

sentences.english: This paper covers the design and orthogonal test of silencer.
sentences.chinese: 本文探讨了消声器设计与正交试验。

sentences.english: Analysis of a New Type Active Noise Cancellation Earmuffs.
sentences.chinese: 一种新型有源消声耳罩的研究。

sentences.english: Active noise control experiments were performed in both a semi-anechoic chamber and an ordinary room.
sentences.chinese: 本文分别在半消声室和普通房间进行有源消声实验。

sentences.english: Active noise control experiments were performed in both a semi-anechoic chamber and an ordinary room.
sentences.chinese: 本文分别在半消声室和普通房间进行有源消声实验。

sentences.english: After disappearing for two years, the gangster surfaced in Thailand last month.
sentences.chinese: 在消声匿迹两年之后，那个流氓上个月在泰国露面了。

sentences.english: The driver deadened the noise of the car with a new muffler.
sentences.chinese: 司机安装了新的消声器减少汽车嗓音。

sentences.english: Prime ministers and presidents are here today and gone tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 国家首相和总统今天还在，明天便已消声匿迹。

sentences.english: Objective To develop a new type of feedback active noise cancellation earmuff(ANCE) for aviator's helmet.
sentences.chinese: 目的研制一种闭环反馈式头盔有源消声系统。

sentences.english: Simple anechoic chamber was used for noise reduction.
sentences.chinese: 根据降噪量要求对设备间采用简易消声室设计。

sentences.english: Then the resistance loss characteristics is analyzed for the different configurations of water silencers.
sentences.chinese: 随后对不同结构水消声器的阻力损失特性进行了分析。

definition: see 後坐力|后坐力[hou4 zuo4 li4]
